Storyline:
A two-segment look at the effect of the military mindset and war itself on Vietnam era Marines.
The first half follows a group of recruits in boot camp under the command of the punishing Gunnery Sergeant Hartman.
The second half shows one of those recruits, Joker, covering the war as a correspondent for Stars and Stripes, focusing on the Tet offensive.
